Interface GlobalRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<UserSessionRepository>, Repository<UserSessionRepository>, Serializable

    public interface GlobalRepository
extends Repository<UserSessionRepository>
    Represents a Repository containing data for all OAuth connexion in the application
